# This .gitignore file should be placed at the root of your Unity project directory.

# Unity generated files
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/

# Autogenerated VS/MD/VSCode files
[Ee]xported[Oo]bj/
.vscode/
.vs/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db
sysinfo.txt

# Unity3D generated meta files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta
*.mdb.meta

# Builds
*.apk
*.aab
*.xcodeproj/
*.xcworkspace/
*.xcuserdata/
*.xcuserdatad/
*.mode1v3
*.mode2v3
*.pbxuser
*.pbxproj
*.plist
*.dSYM/
*.mobileprovision

# Unity Cache Server
$HOME/Library/Caches/com.unity3d.UnityEditor/

# Unity Cloud Build
[Uu]ser[Ss]ettings/

# Crashlytics generated files
crashlytics-build.properties

# Temporary files created by UnityVS extension
unityvs.*

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/

# Node.js dependencies
node_modules/
npm-debug.log

# Yarn
yarn-error.log

# MacOS files
.DS_Store

# Windows files
Thumbs.db
